name: Warsow
description: Warsow is a first-person shooter game with bright cartoon style. During the game, players need to kill enemies by all resources. The game role reversal, arm extension and future sci -fi scenes will take you to experience the fun of a destroyer.

en_US.description: Warsow is a first-person shooter game with bright cartoon style. During the game, players need to kill enemies by all resources. The game role reversal, arm extension and future sci -fi scenes will take you to experience the fun of a destroyer.
en_US.name: Warsow

zh_CN.description: Warsow是一款第一人称射击游戏，游戏风格为明快的卡通风格。游戏中，玩家需要使用一切资源将敌人消灭。游戏包含的角色转换、武器扩展功能以及未来的科幻场景，将带您感受一个破坏者的乐趣。
zh_CN.name: Warsow
